title: ANX and ROX advance to the Quarterfinals
body: We’re all Lunatics now as the CIS’ Albus NoX Luna advances to the Quarterfinals alongside Korea's ROX Tigers.

replies.body:
I'm glad that a Wildcard team made it out of groups. I knew it was going to happen in the next year or two, so it's really good to see.

I just wish there was a bit more humility coming from ANX.
I can't remember a single moment where ANX disrespected or were toxic with others players or teams. Did you see what Likkrit said about G2 ?
This. I literally texted my bestie and was like "This Likkrit kid is a good sport. I like him." and then I went and followed his twitter because I like the cut of his sail. Honest, and a good sport.

'a bit more humility' is different from 'disrespecting others'. I never said they disrespected, insulted, or were toxic to others. One can be arrogant without insulting others.

I said they could use a bit more humility. Perhaps Uminwolf is correct and it's simply poor English making them come across that way, but every interview/article I've seen citing their words has an air of arrogance to it that I find a little disconcerting.

But again, Umin could be correct that it's simply that they're not the best at the language. Either way, I can't help the impression I've gotten from them.

M5 back in the day was the exact same way, if not 'worse.' In any interview that Alex Ich was not a part of, the players would sound really off-putting and arrogant, but it's really just a culture breach from Western Europe/USA to Russia. They don't have the same cultural customs or sensitivities we have over here. I mean, look at this very thread; we're upset at players at **_WORLDS_** levels of humility when it's clear these guys are very excited and humbled to be playing there and performing. It's just a bit too nitpicky to be valid. They're 17-22 year old guys in most cases who've only known what they hear in schoolyards and online. Let them live a little.

> [{quoted}](name=GenesisType,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=91Fo50ws,comment-id=0009000000010000,timestamp=2016-10-08T00:12:52.503+0000)
>
> M5 back in the day was the exact same way, if not 'worse.' In any interview that Alex Ich was not a part of, the players would sound really off-putting and arrogant, but it's really just a culture breach from Western Europe/USA to Russia. They don't have the same cultural customs or sensitivities we have over here. I mean, look at this very thread; we're upset at players at **_WORLDS_** levels of humility when it's clear these guys are very excited and humbled to be playing there and performing. It's just a bit too nitpicky to be valid. They're 17-22 year old guys in most cases who've only known what they hear in schoolyards and online. Let them live a little.

I guess I just expect more from people if they're going to earn my respect than you. Must be easy to live up to such low standards.

I do agree that there is this feeling of no humility, but I think that is a combination of young players fueled by passion and who's english isn't the strongest.
Because honestly, the only lack of humility coming from them i would say is in their word choices, and I can't fault a team from Russia for that.
They do seem to want to respect every team, just might not know "the best" words to use, but I think their intention and spirit are coming from the right place.
I also think they are super hyped that people are cheering for them, so they want to soak up and make as much of the "lime light" as possible.
As long as they don't get crazy with trash talk or feeling themselves, I can look past the passionate hype these guys are probably experiencing.
And lets be honest, they are playing like a world class team. Their macro and communication for the all but a few calls has been completely on point. Even if it's a "bad call" they make it as a team and they don't give up.

They're young, so just give them time to find themselves amongst the crowd and hype, then I think you'll see a world class team with a little bit of spice to them, which is what all great teams need :)
ANX Never bmed, they were very respectful. Idk what ur talking bout.

> [{quoted}](name=xXrushaXx,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=91Fo50ws,comment-id=00090002,timestamp=2016-10-07T17:10:52.550+0000)
>
> ANX Never bmed, they were very respectful. Idk what ur talking bout.

I believe he's talking about what happened after their first loss to ROX. Likkrit didn't shake hands with any of the members on ROX, but he later apologized for it publicly (albeit during the start of his interview after his team picked up their first win at Worlds) and then in all other losses he actually did shake hands with the opposing team.
Here we found the CLG fan.

No actually... most of the teams I'm a fan of didn't make it to Worlds. C9 is the only one who did.

I respect CLG for their accomplishments, and I'm a big fan of Aphromoo as a player. But the teams I like didn't have the best years this year. :)
Could you give an example of this? Cuz every single interview that I saw was literally them respecting the opponent.

What is Riot doing up at 1:50 AM posting on E-Sports

######Inb4 everyone yells at me about timezones
Riot never sleeps. We are always by your side. Always watching. Always. {{champion:3}}

> [{quoted}](name=Mean Mister Kien,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=91Fo50ws,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2016-10-07T07:51:07.577+0000)
>
> Riot never sleeps. We are always by your side. Always watching. Always. {{champion:3}}

"I'm watching you Wazowski, always watching!" - Roz (Monsters Inc.)
Plz dont watch me
Is Riot fueled by salt?
There's no rest in esports!
And with that, everyone's worlds pick 'em is off.
except for the russians
Somewhere out there, there's one guy who did his Pick 'Ems while completely drunk.  He'll be happy about today.

Congratz to ANX for making history. Even though CLG disappointed during that game, they still have improved. Maybe now that we respect Wildcards, it can give us a win next year. CLG give us an amazing run next year
Thats the frame of mind CLG fans need to have. Nice to see the positivity!

I hate it how fans will give up on a team when they start to do bad. Yes CLG has been having a hard couple of years, but they need to realize that getting shot down will only make the team stronger. Also to all people who say teams suck, I suppose you could do better?{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

For future advice never use the "Can you do better?" argument because it is at best a trash argument that allows for no judgement or critique. To the topic at hand, "start to do bad" is a mislabel for CLG. They've been this heaping mess of inconsistency since inception, and only appeared to shake it off spring split. After which their usual trashiness returned promptly despite maintaining the entire roster and (I believe) staff that got them 2nd place finish at MSI* (footnote that MSI is a small sample size of teams so 2nd place finish isn't as impressive, especially when considering that CLG managed to avoid playing the 2 best teams at the tournament in quarters). Most people who watched NA summer and summer playoffs are in concordance that CLG was not in the top 3 of NA. Coming into the group they were not projected to make it out by most accounts, but upon seeing the implosion of G2 (who could've foreseen the vacationers sucking balls again) CLG's chances of making it out of groups actually became very real. They wasted almost no time punting said chance away. Being able to dick down ROX like they did week 1 meant they had the theoretical capability to make it out of groups. Unfortunately, they couldn't help but succumb to their true calling of being trash, and found themselves in the trash next yillian's old jersey. If I were a CLG fan, I would be pretty fed up with how ass they are. Legit straight booty cheeks. Also you say having a hard couple of years (plural) like this isnt only season 6. A couple of years out of a max 6 is grounds to turn one's back on them.
Ok that's fair. At least it wasn't hate.
Now what seed will they vs in the quarters
EDG
EDG vs ANX AHQ vs ROX
We don't know that for sure... No one knew that ANX would get out.

What??
They draw their opponent after group stage

ANX will play a #1 team and ROX will play a #2 team.

We have no idea what groups those will come from yet (it is randomized). We also, obviously, do not know what teams will finish as #1 and #2 seeds in the other 3 groups.

This is completely out from a sports anime. Wildcard team does the impossible and marks history, reaching the heart of new fans, even though the #1 rival still took first place. Cannot wait for season 2 where they take over and win
NICEESUUU ^_^
Congrats ANX <3

When ANX gets swept out I hope CLG feels even worse than they've made their fans feel over the years.  I stuck with them through disappointing season in 2013 and 2014.  I stuck with them after their embarrassing performance last year.  But this is too much.  Go to hell, CLG. {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
i'm in the same boat man. i been clg fan since 2014. but after that draft against anx and how dumb that team comp was. time for me to find a new na team. and it wont be team solo cry
C9 then? They've been on an upswing since Hai left. We'll be happy to have you and your energy.

Oh god forbid, CLG is actually human! They have one of the best ever finishes by an NA team internationally, they always seem to Counter all Logic(for better or worse) making them one of the most exciting teams to watch, and they never count themselves out against anyone. CLG fan and proud, since season 3!

I hope you are not referring to this worlds as "one of the best ever finishes by an NA team internationally," but are referring to MSI. Which, btw, was a small sample of teams and that previous success clg has shown to be unable to replicate. They were trash summer split, are trash in worlds, and got trashed in groups. They blew their load with the aurelion sol and had basically nothing left after that. Their top lane has been underporfor ING for quite some time, sitxxay and aphro fluxuate between good and trash, and the trash side showed up more this worlds, and their mid is, for all intents and purposes, a 1 trick. That being said, no one reasonably thought clg would do well or make it out of groups so to say they disappointed would be innacurate. Luckily for them, G2 has proven to be the pinnacle of trash. Good news is they don't have to take a plane home.
Choke Lots Gaming strikes again

They lost to the tourny favorites and a surprizingly great team in ANX. CLG even defied their region's expectations (their own casters putting them in 3rd). The real (j/ch)oke is G2. What happened to EU? They were much better than this, and even have some of their star players in fanatic still there.
The moment we knew G2 and EU were still bad CLG had expectations to make it out, but they choked. Both are chokes.

This is what happens at Worlds when YellOwStaR and Dyrus aren't there. Wildcards strike, EU fails, and TSM looks like it has a chance.

(I love Dyrus but I love him so much more now that he's a full-time streamer. Pls don't kill me.)
Nah g yellowstar left so TSM can actually start winning xdxd (banter)
Yellowstar is a great support. He's just not the type of support that TSM or Doublelift need. Plain and simple. :)

LOL. I think Biofrost is much better for TSM than YS was, just because of how poor his synergy was with Doublelift.

He's still got my respect just because he's one of the pros that has remained relevant to the pro scene in League from the beginning.
Bio def has better synergy w/ dlift than ys had... I'm a pretty big Bio fan

didn't anyone tell you to not spoil the results?

I'm was thinking of casually watching the games over the weekend, and now my group A results are spoiled.

> **Especially when other rioter's name pops up on the red tracker on the boards, and the title is all there for people to see.**

Please use a different title next time.

Great idea! Hmmm....I want to watch the games this weekend and I don't want to spoil the results. What's a good idea? OH, LET ME LOG ON TO THE LOL.ESPORTS WEBSITE. I am sure ABSOLUTELY NOTHING will be there! You dug your own grave bud. If you don't want to spoil the results, don't go on to the only website that can. Stop blaming riot.
